sub_title: International Marketing & Communications Team Member (Junior) - Hanze University of Applied Sciences, Student Ambassador, International Communication student
summary:
I am an International Marketing & Communication professional with experience in digital content marketing, research and event hosting. Overall, I am inspired by any visual, written and spoken communication and passionate about using creative writing, public speaking and design to help organizations establish meaningful connections with their audiences in the modern, dynamic, interlinked world. 

Currently, I work in international education, creating content and facilitating events for international students of the Hanze University of Applied Sciences. My goal is to aid applicants with study choice (a lifechanging decision!), guide them from admission to relocation abroad, and support current students in their educational paths. To respond to my target audience’s needs, I continuously engage in research and exercise critical thinking. 

I am a quick and eager learner, continuously striving to improve my skillset. My International Communication studies at the Hanze UAS Groningen and a completed exchange at the American Business School of Paris aid me in my thirst for knowledge, allowing me to broaden my competencies and improve my intercultural sensitivity skills.

The American Business School of Paris

company.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
Digital and content marketing
· Developing and executing a content marketing strategy, comprising multiple social media channels, aimed at recruitment and conversion
· Scheduling a content calendar with 2 diverse topics per week 
· Increased the subscribed audience by 40%
· Retained 99,2% of follower base through crisis communication efforts during a political crisis
· Creating audiovisual and textual content in Russian and English, resulting in higher target audience engagement and leads accumulation 
· Social media channels optimization and research
· Customer care for approx. 300 Russian-speaking leads and applicants 

Events hosting and facilitation
· Hosting, facilitating or moderating 15+ events (fairs, webinars, livestreams, open and welcome days), which led to increased leads accumulation, higher customer engagement and conversion
· Developing attendees-tailored content for online events with 80+ participants
 
External and internal communication 
· Corporate communication track improvement: developing guidelines for marketing professionals to communicate with customers
· The Voice of the International Marketing Team video and audio communication products
· Directing and scripting audiovisual communication products (e.g., a series of podcasts and videos)

Research
· Conducting research into the target audience needs, trends, etc., resulting in content for events and media projects with multiple stakeholders
· Analyzing and reporting digital marketing results and KPIs
profile_positions.title: Junior International Marketing & Communication Team Member

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
•	Managing social media to reach and engage with (prospective) students to guide them through application process to Hanze UAS, relocation to the Netherlands and offer support; increased the follower base by 37%

•	Developing marketing content such as blogposts, audiovisual media and promotional materials for Instagram

•	Analyzing and reporting social media and online marketing activities’ results

•	Preparing content for and representing Hanze UAS at (online) events, such as webinars, fairs, welcome days, aimed at facilitating (prospective) students, raising brand awareness and collecting leads 

•	Communicating with prospective students through social media and direct marketing (call sessions and emails) to assist them with practical matters during application to the university

company.name: Gomelsky Brothers Basketball Academy (Баскетбольная Академия Братьев Гомельских)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Established by the world-famous basketball coach, Olympic Champion (1992) Evgeniy Gomelsky, the Academy specializes in organizing educational and sports events. Lectures and seminars, given by Evgeniy Gomelsky, are aimed at basketball coaches and PE teachers who work with children and cover not only sport technicalities, but psychological aspects of working with minors. The Academy also takes part in organizing basketball games and tournaments. 

As a Social Media officer, I create content for the Basketball Academy, publishing articles and visual content in Facebook and Instagram, increasing community engagement.

skills: Adobe software (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Lightroom)
